dct_title_s: Small map of Rutgers University College Avenue Campus from Rutgers Alumni Monthly
dct_description_sm: Revised version of a 1939 map drawn by Charles Stover completed by Alpha Phi Omega in 1950. Published in Rutgers Alumni Monthly in October of that same year. The map depicts the downtown campuses of the Colleges for Men.
